_description: Four of the ‘Twelve Abuses of the Age’ — four monoriming lines in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
frenchipe is felounieManchipe is vileynieClergie is
                    tresorie& borwing is roberie
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 5.
